item.title: I Took a Chinese Class
item.description: So I took a Chinese class Last semester I took a Chinese class and thought it would be enlightening to share my experience. It turns out classes are extremely helpful and I learned a ton. Just Kidding Classes suck. The teacher could barely speak English despite being in America for over a decade. How am I supposed to take her advice seriously? I only know how to say one sentence in Chinese.
